titles: Parasitaster, or The favvne as it hath been diuers times presented at the blacke Friars, by the Children of the Queenes Maiesties Reuels, and since at Powles. VVritten by Iohn Marston.
author: Marston, John, 1575?-1634.
publisher: Printed by T[homas] P[urfoot] for VV. C[otton],
notes: Printer's and publisher's names from STC.
